metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28189 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a NULLpointer dereference may lead to a system crash.
